start.state: Yeah, let's play! This'll teach Sonic I'm not a kid anymore!

case.state: Better you than me...
I'm a bit curious to see what about to happen next...
nothing I haven't already seen.
I guess that's fair...
It's almost as big as Sonic's...say you wouldn't happen to be busy later would you?
We have alige one here...
It looks as strong as Knuckles.

...It will do, but it's not very 'super'
Guess someone's not going for the fastest time
Really? You're have to that now? I can see someone's in a rush.
I'm starting to get slightly jealous...
When running, try to get a good start...
Super...!
Oh boy, now the waterworks start...
I see my hand hasn't gone unrewarded.
Maybe if you tryed something more daring, you'll get a better time...
One less distraction on the way to the goal.
Sonic's better, but I like what you've got going on...
Don't go too fast...I don't want to miss this...
Nice and smooth, just like my Sonic..
I can see someone has been saving some air bubbles...
Let's see what you're hiding.
I can't say I'm not interested in seeing how this plays out...
This is going to be good...
Seems Tails and you have a lot in common...
This game is moving slower than Big the cat...
I think that preformance deserves an S.
They look a lot like Cream's...
Hey! They kinda look like mine...
At this rate, this game will get a E ranking.
If you where chasing Sonic, wasting this much time wouldn't help you very much
Another perfect game for Team Rose
This is what you get when you mess with a hedgehog on a mission...
That's okay...
That was great! Wait, that came out wrong....
I haven't gotten to see other's before...this will be...interesting.
Your taking your time, but your style is flawless...
Not very good, but fair...
I can see someone's going for the best time...
No problems, no worries!

I'll take ~cards~ cards, please!
Let's swap ~cards~ cards!
Let's go for ~cards~ new cards!
Oh, this is just garbage.
Well, I came here prepared to lose once or twice...
Ah, I'm in no rush.
You know, I'd really love to run away right now, but rules are rules.
Guess I'll take off my boots first.
Well, I'd rather not speed and catch up to your losses!
Let's keep it that way.
Wonder what your chest looks like, ~name~. Not that I'm interested or anything...
I see you chose to take off that. Very bold.
That's a nice size package there. Not that I'm interested or anything....
...but I'll accept it anyway...
Oh my! What a package!
Whoa! Sonic's got nothing on that package!
Wow! That's a big set you got there!
We going to see some skin?

Time to see you go at it, ~name~!
I'm starting to get slightly jealous...
Yay, It's not me this time...
It's....beautiful....
Oh boy, now the waterworks start...

You look better without it...
Well I'm glad you like them...
Can't stop till you're done, ~name~!
That's one nice chest, ~name~!

I guess I'm glad you caught up.

What the character says just after they've finished masturbating.
What the character says when someone else has won the game. This can only occur when a player is in the "finished" stage.

epilogue.gender: "male", "female", or "any". This is the gender of player that can see the ending
epilogue.title: This is the title of the character's ending, and the start of a new ending

screen.img: filename (including extension) of the background image for a screen. Also the start of a new screen

text.x: The x-position of the text box. Specifically, the position of the text box's left side. This can be a percentage, or the word "centered"
text.y: The y-position of the top of the text box. Must be a percentage.
text.width: The width of a text box. This is optional. Must be a percentage.
text.arrow: "up", "down", "left", or "right". Gives the text box a dialogue arrow in the specified direction. Can be left out, if you don't want the text box to be an arrow.
text.content: The text in the text box.
This is text that will be seen by the player. It has a width of 34% and an arrow pointing down.
This is a centered text box. It has the default width and an arrow pointing right.
This third text box has minimum amount of values specified. It uses the default width, and has no arrow.
